question.title: 1. The teacher’s lecture on American history was three hours long, and Mary felt very _____.
question.note: 关于美国历史，这个教师讲了有三个小时长，这让Mary 感到非常讨厌。 upset 难过的，不安的； bored 令（人）厌烦； disturbed 打扰，扰乱，弄乱； neglected 忽视，忽略。

question.title: 2. Her mind was so _____ by the disease that she could not remember what she had done.
question.note: influenced （正面的）影响； effected （正面的） 影响； affected （坏的）影响；

question.title: 3. Every boy and girl _____ not to swim in the lake, for it is polluted.
question.note: 每个男孩儿和女孩儿被警示不准去那个湖里游泳，因为这个湖被污染了。以every开头，谓语动词用单数。

question.title: She heard a terrible noise, _____ brought her heart into her mouth.
question.note: 她听到一阵可怕的声音，这让她心都提到噪子眼儿了。 这是一个非限制性定语从句，定的是前面的一句话，这种情况下用which来引导。

question.title: 5. Why can’t you do this small _____ for me? I’ve helped you often enough in the past.
question.note: to do a favour for sb 或to do sb a favour 帮某人个忙； 句子中do this small favour for me 意思是： 帮我一个小忙。

question.title: 6. _____ he often forgot their wedding anniversary greatly annoyed his wife.
question.note: 这是一个头重脚轻的主语从句，wedding anniversary 结婚纪念日。

question.title: 7. You screamed in your sleep last night. You _____ a terrible dream.
question.note: 你一定是做了个恶梦了，用完成时态。

question.title: 8. However much _____, it will be worth the money.
question.note: 这道题考时态，考语序， However much the dictionary costs： 不管这本词典花多少钱。

question.title: 9. I don’t care _____ or not she will apologize to me.
question.note: 我并不在意她是否给我道歉； whether or not “是否”，固定搭配用法。

question.title: 10. One of my brother’s many faults is that he never _____ anything very long.
question.note: stick to 坚持； 我弟弟的缺点之一就是什么事儿都不能坚持太久。

question.title: 11. The departure of the train will be _____ for half an hour.
question.note: cancel 取消，撤消； set off 出发，动身； postpone 延迟，推迟； delayed 延迟，耽误。

question.title: 12. But for his sister’s help, I _____ the work.
question.note: 当时要不是他姐姐的帮助，我就不能完成那项工作。

question.title: 13. Emphasis is laid on the necessity that all the objectives to be attained _____ into account before starting a new project.
question.note: 选be taken中的should省略，这句话是说：在开始一个新的项目之前，应考虑把重点放在将要实现的所有目标的必要性上。

question.title: 14. Sixty per cent of television viewers chose her as their _____ actress.
question.note: favourite 受欢迎的，这句话的意思是：百分之六十的观众选择她为最受欢迎的演员。

question.title: 15. Judges must be independent _____ political pressure.
question.note: 法官一定不能受政治压力的影响； be independent of 不受…影响。

question.title: 16. I looked everywhere for some cooking oil, but I could only find ____.
question.note: cooking oil 是不可数名词，另外根据境可知：这个句子又表示肯定的含义，（若选a few则表示否定含义，即一点也没有找到）所以选择选项a little。

question.title: 17. Al’s doctor insists _____ for a few days.
question.note: Al 的医生坚持要他休息了些日子； insist 后面用虚拟语气，should可省略。

question.title: 18. There wasn’t much snow last winter so people couldn’t go ____ except in the mountains.
question.note: go skiing 去划雪； 类似的还有： go shopping 去购物； go swimming 去游泳； go boating 去划船。

question.title: 19. You’ve got to be on top _____ to do well in a competition like that.
question.note: 固定搭配用法：to be on top form 处于最佳状态。

question.title: 20. Your behavior was shocking. You should be ashamed _____ yourself.
question.note: 你的行为令人感到震惊，你应当为此感到羞愧; be ashamed of … 为…感到羞愧。

question.title: 21. I suppose you couldn’t let me borrow your car this evening, _____?
question.note: suppose 后面的从句中为否定式couldn’t，而主句为肯定式，这是否定后移的用法，后面的反意疑问句要根据从句而定，故反意疑问句用肯定式could you。

question.title: 22. _____ five hundred people are believed to have drowned.
question.note: 首先As much as、So much as不对，因为much后面修饰不可数名词； as many as 与…一样多，后面可以接具体的数字；而So many as项不正确，因为：so many as 如此众多的，后面不能出现具体的数字； drown 淹死；

question.title: 23. I chose a small room with the window _____ the street.
question.note: 我选了一个窗户对着街道的小房间。现在分词短语做定语，主动含义。

question.title: 24. _____ the rain we would have had a nice holiday.
question.note: but for… 要不是因为…；介词短语代替条件从句的用法。

question.title: 25. “It’s too bad Rhonda is moving to Arizona.” “I wish it _____ so far away.”
question.note: wish后面接虚拟语气的用法。

question.title: 26. _____ I don’t like are the long, dark nights of winter.
question.note: what引导的名词性从句，这句话的意思是：我所不喜欢的是冬季那漫长而黑暗的夜晚。

question.title: 27. The receptions, _____ job was to answer the phone, had laryngitis(喉炎).
question.note: reception 接待员，接待，招待会，接受； 这是一个非限制性定语从句，whose job was 其工作是…。 这句话是说：那个接待员，其工作是接电话，他得了喉炎。

question.title: 28. The suggestions put forward by the workers to improve their working conditions were _____ by the factory owner.
question.note: turn down 拒绝； turn away 打发走； turn over 把…弄翻了； 项turned through错误，没有这种形式。

question.title: 29. With apples at 25 cents a pound, we couldn’t resist _____ four pounds.
question.note: resist doing … 禁不住…；看到苹果25分一磅，我们禁不住买了四磅。

question.title: 30. Well-mannered children have usually been properly _____ by their parents.
question.note: bring up 养育； Well-mannered children 行为举止良好的孩子，有教养的孩子。有教养的孩子往往都是家长培养教育的结果。没有raised up项这种用法，因为raise是及物动词，后面不能跟介词； borne up 坚强，毫不气馁。

question.title: 31. Tom’s father, as well as his mother, _____ in New York for a few days more.
question.note: as well as his mother, 不影响谓语动词的使用，主语是Tom’s father，另外ask sb to do sth 要求(请)某人做某事，这句话是说：汤姆的爸爸，还有她的妈妈，要他在纽约再待一段时间。

question.title: 32. If we had known that she had planned to go abroad today, we _____ at the airport.
question.note: 如果我们知道她计划今天出国，我们一定去机场给她送行了。前面的虚拟条件句是对过去情况的一种假设，谓语用过去完成时态， 故主句用would have done 这种形式。

question.title: 33. Living in the central Australian desert has its problems, _____obtaining water is not the least.
question.note: 这是一个非限制性定语从句，which指代的是前面的problems, of which… 在…当中；

question.title: 34. He burned all the important papers _____ that should fall into enemy’s hands.
question.note: for fear that 以免，担心； 他烧掉了所有重要的资料，以免落入敌人的手掌。

question.title: 35. Literature and art have a great influence _____ people’s ideology.
question.note: have a great influence on … 对…有很大的影响，这句话是说：文学和艺术对人们影响很大。
